price: Кечиримли бўлинг, яхшиликка буюринг ва жоҳиллардан юз ўгиринг.
arabic: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khudhi al-ʿafwa wamur bil-ʿur'fi wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-jāhilīna
